original: Liden, Sten Erik Torgny, läroverksadjunkt, Borås, f. 12/4/00 i Norberg, Västmanl. 1., av folkskolinsp., fil. dr Oskar L. o. Selma Strömberg. G. 1. 26 m. Märta Ljunggren, d. 31; 2. 35 m. Maja Ericson. Barn: Ingrid f. 27, Ann-Mari 28, d. 36, Torgny 31, Sten Sture 36, Bengt 39, Anna Kajsa 46. — Stud:ex. v. Lunds priv. elem:sk. 17, fil. kand. 21, fil. mag. s. å., provår i Gbg 26. Res. t. Engl. 23, Danm. 24, Tyskl. 25, Frankr. 26, Tyskl. 29, Frankr. 34 o. 35. Vik. ämneslär. i Jonstorp 19-20, e. o. dito i Ljungby 20-21, Strömsnäsbruk 23-25, ord. ämneslär. där 25, adj. i Karlskr. 27, adj. i tyska o. franska v. Borås li. a. 1. sed. 42. Skr.: Undervisningen i tyska o. eng. v. franska lärov. (36) m. fl. Hobby: sport.
translated:
Liden, Sten Erik Torgny, high school teacher, Borås, born on April 12, 1900 in Norberg, Västmanland. Son of elementary school inspector Oskar L. and Selma Strömberg. Married 1. in 1926 to Märta Ljunggren, died in 1931; 2. in 1935 to Maja Ericson. Children: Ingrid, born in 1927; Ann-Mari, born in 1928, died in 1936; Torgny, born in 1931; Sten Sture, born in 1936; Bengt, born in 1939; Anna Kajsa, born in 1946. 

Education: Graduated from Lund's private elementary school in 1917; Bachelor's degree in 1921; Master's degree in the same year; probationary year in Gothenburg in 1926. Traveled to England in 1923, Denmark in 1924, Germany in 1925, France in 1926, Germany in 1929, France in 1934 and 1935. Temporary subject teacher in Jonstorp from 1919-1920, acting subject teacher in Ljungby from 1920-1921, Strömsnäsbruk from 1923-1925, regular subject teacher there from 1925, assistant teacher in Karlskrona in 1927, assistant teacher in German and French in Borås since 1941. Writings: Teaching German and English at French schools (1936) and others. Hobby: sports.

writings.headline: Teaching German and English at French Schools
